features: 🌷Multi-Purpose Cleaning: This mini broom and brush set is perfect for sweeping and cleaning a variety of surfaces - can be used in the kitchen, bedroom, dining room, car, patio, keyboards, desk, countertops, cabinets, closets, sofas, pet cleaning, and even cleaning up messes from children's meals, etc.

🌷Efficient and Durable : Manual cleaning can also be very easy! The set comes with two sets of small dustpans and brushes made of dense, durable bristles that won't scratch cleaning surfaces and easily catch dust and debris even in tight corners.

🌷Convenient Storage: Both the whisk brush and dustpan handles have holes for hanging storage options, perfect for easy hanging as well as storage; the dustpan handle snaps directly onto the dustpan handle, making it easy to carry with you all the time.

🌷Creative Design: Unprecedented pink leopard print design will impress you deeply! The set is cute and sturdy, Ergonomically designed brush and dustpan handles, Non-slip grips also allow you to sweep your trash with less effort.
🌷Quality Guarantee: If the hand dustpan and brush are damaged or bent during delivery, please contact us, we will give you a satisfactory reply at the first time.

🎁Unforgettable Gift: ThinkLearn hand broom and dustpan set is the best choice for your home cleaning! Can be an unforgettable gift to yourself or which one you loved on Christmas, Halloween, Easter and any other holiday.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect For little Messes
reviews.reviewText: These little dust pans and brushes are perfect for cleaning off your counter tops and table tops after a meal. Easy to store under your sink or in a cabinet with cooking items.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my unconventional need!
reviews.reviewText: These mini dustpan and broom sets are perfect for “sweeping up” debris that is left over in the sink after washing dishes at work. Not having a garbage disposal has its disadvantages, like not being able to put food debris down the sink. These dustpan and brooms are the perfect size and solution for my problem. They are also easy to wash and store. I imagine they would be useful to keep in your car, camper, garage, or anywhere you might need a “little” sweeping action.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute Little Dustpan and Brush Set for a Helpful Kiddo
reviews.reviewText: This is a neat little dustpan and brush set for the kiddo who wants to help while cleaning. I imagine you could also use it as a nice little desk pan as well. It is relatively small, the brush dimensions are around 7" x 5.75" so you aren't going to get a large amount of stuff around the house, but it's good for small spills or dirt gathering. The print on the brush is detailed and looks nice, and the bristles are colored so it makes it a fun little set for our kid. The bristles themselves are a medium stiffness, so they are still helpful when trying to sweep something up, and the pan itself is tapered at the bottom so things can be swept into it easily. All in all this really helps her feel like she's contributing when we're cleaning, and she's very proud of herself when using it, ha ha! Good item if that's what you're looking for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m a dog groomer and I got these so I could have something more compact to clean up my station from loose hairs. These work fine. As you can see in the picture some of the bristles are bent or pointing out. It still works it’s just not aesthetically pleasing. A few of the bristles have fallen out since I got them as well. I would say they are a little expensive for what they are. At $13.99, it’s a little lower quality than I imagined but they have, for the most part, held up to what I need them for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Well the idea was cute. Not what I was expecting at all. The broom is super thin. T bristles are all messed up, some sticking this way and some sticking that way. Some are long and some are short. The print on them wasn't applied very well at all. They are ok for quick small messes but I wouldn't use it to sweep up sand, glitter, sugar or anything that fine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Small and cute, but works okay
reviews.reviewText: Good for small spaces, and easy to hide out of sight when not in use. Works okay in a pinch, but only for really small jobs, and that's about it. It's cheap and I can see that over time it may not clean as well. The brush itself isn't great. It's flimsy and doesn't sweep great. Even trying to clean dust off the dustpan with the brush wasn't working great. This seems more like a novelty item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this 2 set mini brush/dustpan!
reviews.reviewText: This 2 piece mini dustpan and brush set (there are 2 sets-2 brush/brooms and 2 dustpans). They're both fashionable and functional. The mini brushes/brooms work well for small spaces (like office, car, home, steps, etc). They sweep up a lot of small things, I was very impressed. The dustpans are also very sturdy, and easy to brush the dirt into them, then dump in the wastebasket. These have holes in the top of both the brush and the dustpans, so you can easily hang these up for easy storage. These work very well, and have many great qualities about them. I love the leopard print, mixed with the pink color too. These would make a cute little gift for someone as well. I feel the price is affordable, very happy with my order! 😊
